participant_1.background:
I'm a talented singer, but I'm afraid to tell my parents because they might want me to perform in public.
i go to dance lessons with my boyfriend.
i used to be in the marines.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I value my car because it allows me to be independent and travel wherever I want.

participant_2.background:
I remember listening to Yo Gotti with my brothers in the car on our way to the beach.
I play the guitar because it is a good way to express myself and I enjoy the challenge of learning new songs.
I am a writer that is also sensitive to people's reactions to my work.
I love the outdoors and finding new ways to express myself.
i love to go to the beach.

content.text: Hello! I'm a talented singer, but I'm afraid to tell my parents because they might want me to perform in public. What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I like to go to the beach and listen to Yo Gotti with my brothers. What's your favorite song to sing?
I love singing "Fancy" by Iggy Azalea. It's a really fun song to sing and dance to!
I love that song! I also love to play the guitar. It's a great way to express myself and I enjoy the challenge of learning new songs.
That's awesome! I used to play the guitar when I was younger, but I haven't picked it up in a while.
You should start playing again! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax.
I think I will! Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about music.
Me too! I love talking about music.
Have you been to the beach lately?
No, I haven't been to the beach in a while. I miss it!
We should go to the beach together sometime! It would be a lot of fun.
That would be awesome! I would love to go to the beach with you.
Great! We'll make a plan soon.
